virtual_machines_kvm.query: SELECT name, state, vcpu, memory, autostart FROM kvm_instances;
virtual_machines_kvm.description: KVM virtual machine status and configuration
virtual_machines_kvm.value: Monitor hypervisor VM instances and resource allocation

lxd_containers.query: SELECT name, status, stateful, ephemeral, created_at FROM lxd_instances;
lxd_containers.description: LXD container instances and their status

docker_containers_detailed.query: SELECT id, name, image, image_id, command, created, state, status, ports, size_rw, size_root_fs FROM docker_containers;
docker_containers_detailed.value: Comprehensive container monitoring including resource usage

docker_images.query: SELECT id, created, size_bytes, tags FROM docker_images;
docker_images.description: Docker images available on the system
docker_images.value: Track container images for security and storage management

docker_networks.query: SELECT id, name, driver, subnet, gateway FROM docker_networks;

docker_volumes.query: SELECT name, driver, mount_point FROM docker_volumes;
docker_volumes.description: Docker volume configurations and mount points

virtualization_info.value: Identify hypervisor type and virtualization capabilities

bridge_interfaces.query: SELECT name, protocol, address, netmask, options FROM bridge_addresses;
bridge_interfaces.value: Monitor virtual network bridges used by hypervisors

process_cpu_intensive.query: SELECT name, pid, cpu_time, sys_time, user_time, cmdline FROM processes WHERE cpu_time > 10000 ORDER BY cpu_time DESC LIMIT 20;
process_cpu_intensive.value: Monitor resource usage of hypervisor and VM processes

process_memory_intensive.query: SELECT name, pid, resident_size, virtual_size, cmdline FROM processes WHERE resident_size > 100000000 ORDER BY resident_size DESC LIMIT 20;
process_memory_intensive.value: Track high memory usage processes including VMs

network_bandwidth.query: SELECT interface, bytes_sent, bytes_received, packets_sent, packets_received FROM interface_details WHERE interface NOT LIKE 'lo%';
network_bandwidth.value: Monitor network bandwidth usage for VM traffic

disk_io_stats.query: SELECT name, reads, writes, read_bytes, write_bytes, read_time, write_time FROM disk_stats;
disk_io_stats.description: Disk I/O statistics for all devices
disk_io_stats.value: Monitor storage performance for hypervisor workloads

maas_agent_processes.query: SELECT name, pid, cmdline, parent FROM processes WHERE (name LIKE '%maas%' OR cmdline LIKE '%maas%' OR name LIKE '%gough%' OR cmdline LIKE '%gough%');

cloud_init_status.query: SELECT path, size, mtime, atime FROM file WHERE path LIKE '/var/lib/cloud/%' OR path LIKE '/var/log/cloud-init%';
cloud_init_status.value: Track cloud-init provisioning status and logs

storage_pools.query: SELECT pool_name, pool_type, pool_allocation, pool_capacity, pool_available FROM lxd_storage_pools;
storage_pools.value: Monitor storage resources for container deployments
